title: Trump's 2020 strategy comes into focus, with Peter Baker and Alexi McCammond
description: As cultural issues return to the top of the political conversation, Chuck Todd asks Peter Baker, Chief White House Correspondent for the New York Times, and Alexi McCammond, political reporter for Axios, what it means for President Trump's re-election strategy. Plus, is Biden's lead the "revenge of the center" in Democratic politics?
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
